text: Tekh, kotoryye vyzhidayut, chto budet s vami, yesli vam budet pobeda ot Allakha, oni skazhut: "Razve my ne byli s vami?" A yesli budet udel nevernym, oni skazhut: "Razve my ne staralis' pomoch' vami i ne zashchishchali vas ot veruyushchikh?" No Allakh rassudit vas v den' voskreseniya. I nikogda Allakh ne ustroit nevernym dorogi protiv veruyushchikh
